Articles.Content:
;P Awesome! Little Kerbonaut emoticons!

Hay guize! Been dabbling in rocket science for about 3 days now, and have 'been' to the mun. By been, I mean left several face-shaped craters in its surface. The landing continues to be an issue. In any case, hope to see all y\'all around! =P

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
